it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.UserManager
      • it.polimi.travlendarplus.beans.calendarManager.EventManager

  • public class EventManager
extends UserManager
    This class provide all methods related to handle the user's events

      • addEvent

        public java.util.List<Event> addEvent(AddEventMessage eventMessage)
                               throws InvalidFieldException,
                                      GMapsGeneralException
        Adds an event into the user's calendar
        Parameters:
        eventMessage - representation of the event to be added
        Returns:
        the added event, and the modified ones ( path can change after an event insertion)
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if some fields of the message are invalid
        GMapsGeneralException - if something has gone wrong during the communication with GMaps-API

      • propagatePeriodicEvents

        public void propagatePeriodicEvents(GenericEvent event)
                             throws GMapsGeneralException
        Create all periodic events after an insertion of a periodic event ( recursively up to an year )
        Parameters:
        event - previous periodic event
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable

      • addEventAndModifyFollowingEvent

        public Event addEventAndModifyFollowingEvent(Event event)
                                      throws GMapsGeneralException
        Provide the event with a feasible path, if it exist, modify also the following event path if needed This method is used in a visitor pattern in order to add the events into the user's calendar
        Parameters:
        event - event to be added
        Returns:
        the following event, if modified, null otherwise
        Throws:
        GMapsGeneralException - if the path computation fails cause Google maps services are unavailable

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the requested typeOfEvent

      • checkPropagationConditions

        private boolean checkPropagationConditions(GenericEvent event,
                                           java.time.Instant upperBound)
        Checks if an event is to be propagated in time
        Parameters:
        event - event to be propagated
        upperBound - time upper bound until which the event is to be propagated
        Returns:
        true if the event is to be propagated, false otherwise

      • deleteEvent

        public java.util.List<Event> deleteEvent(long id)
                                  throws EntityNotFoundException,
                                         GMapsGeneralException
        Delete an event from the user's calendar
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the event
        Returns:
        a list of modified events, due to the deletion, it might be an empty list
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - if the event to be deleted does not exists
        GMapsGeneralException - if the re-computation of the path of the following event fails cause Google maps services are unavailable

      • addBreakEvent

        public BreakEvent addBreakEvent(AddBreakEventMessage eventMessage)
                         throws InvalidFieldException
        Allows to add a break event into the user's calendar
        Parameters:
        eventMessage - message that represents the event to be added
        Returns:
        the inserted event
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if some fields are wrong ( which one is written inside the exception class)

      • modifyEvent

        public java.util.List<Event> modifyEvent(ModifyEventMessage eventMessage)
                                  throws InvalidFieldException,
                                         EntityNotFoundException,
                                         GMapsGeneralException
        Modifies an already existent event
        Parameters:
        eventMessage - event representing the changed fields
        Returns:
        the modified events
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if some fields are wrong ( which one is written inside the exception class)
        EntityNotFoundException - if the event to be modified does not exists
        GMapsGeneralException - if the re-computation of the path of the following event fails cause Google maps services are unavailable

      • startEventPropagatorThread

        private void startEventPropagatorThread(GenericEvent genericEvent)
        Starts a separate thread that will create all the periodic events up to an year ( done in a separate thread due to heavy workload, especially with daily events )
        Parameters:
        genericEvent - event to be propagated in the calendar

        Returns:

      • modifyBreakEvent

        public BreakEvent modifyBreakEvent(ModifyBreakEventMessage eventMessage)
                            throws InvalidFieldException,
                                   EntityNotFoundException,
                                   GMapsGeneralException
        Modifies an already existent break event
        Parameters:
        eventMessage - message representing the break event to be modified
        Returns:
        the modified break event
        Throws:
        InvalidFieldException - if some fields are wrong ( which one is written inside the exception class)
        EntityNotFoundException - if the break event does not exist
        GMapsGeneralException - if the re-computation of the path of the following event fails cause Google maps services are unavailable
